content: crocheted skull cap kufi darling daddy hat page 1 of 6 crocheted skull cap kufi darling daddy hat now you have your own personal guide for crocheting a cool skullcap by yourself of course you have a basic knowledge of crocheting and all you need is attentiveness and a few things listed below you need  1 5 mm and 2mm crochet hook  100% cotton yarn skein of 50grams/240m or 1 76 oz/262yards for example i used vita coco cotton only 1 skein of yarn is needed for an adult cap having measurements of the head 21-22 inches 55-58cm in circumference and the 5-6 inches 15-16 cm long crochet symbols and abbreviations crocheted skull cap kufi darling daddy hat page 2 of 6 written pattern ch8 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring note first 3 chains of starting chain counts as double_crochet finish rounds with a slip_stitch to the 3rd chain of starting chain round 1 ch3 11dc into the ring total 12dc round 2 ch5 *1dc in next double_crochet ch2* repeat 10 times round 3 increase with ch3 and 1dc ch2 *increase with 2dc in next double_crochet ch2* repeat 10 times round 4 ch3 increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 3dc ch2 *1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 3dc ch2* repeat 10 times round 5 ch3 increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 4dc ch2 *1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 4dc ch2* repeat 10 times round 6 ch3 1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 5dc ch2 *1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 5dc ch2* repeat 10 times round 7 ch3 1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 6dc ch2 *1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 6dc ch2* repeat 10 times round 8 ch3 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 7dc ch2 *1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 7dc ch2* repeat 10 times round 9 single_crochet ch3 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 5dc ch2 2dc in next chain space ch2 *1dc in the 2nd double_crochet from the hook 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 5dc ch2 2dc in next chain space ch2* repeat 10 times round 10 single_crochet ch3 1dc in next double_crochet 1dc in next double_crochet 3dc ch2 increase with 2dc in next double_crochet increase with 2dc in next double_crochet ch2 *1dc in the 2nd double_crochet
